title: Magical Girl, Repeat - Novel Updates
tags: Bisexual Protagonist   Brainwashing   Exhibitionism   Female Protagonist   Futanari   Hypnotism   Incest   Magical Girls   R-18   Short Story
author: Rimokon   リモコン
description:
Rinne-chan is a Magical Girl.
As Tear Garnet, she’s a warrior of justice who fights evil.
Rinne-chan has been caught in a loop that repeats the same day!
Each time the loop repeats, her world undergoes a perverted transformation, little by little.
Will Rinne-chan be able to escape from this loop!?>
